About the Company: Frontline Securities Ltd. is engaged primarily in mutual fund distribution and its extensive expertise in this field enables it to provide professional, knowledge based service. The company offers wealth management services; mutual fund distribution services, including analysis, tax planning, and back office and online services; and insurance planning. It also provides corporate advisory services related to mergers and acquisitions and foreign collaborations.
